title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Poetry Contest
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Special Events     Poetry Contest                Big Cypress Poetry Contest       April is National Poetry Month and what better way to celebrate than with a poetry contest? Inaugurated by the Academy of American Poets in 1996, National Poetry Month is held each April, when schools, publishers, libraries, booksellers, and poets celebrate poetry and its vital place in American culture. Big Cypress National Preserve has conducted poetry contests for the past three years.  This year, 2016, we are taking a break from conducting the contest, but check back in 2017 to get involved with the contest.
